songs.title: Who Do You Love
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I feel it in my bones, feel it til' I turn green
Gettin' me all pissy 'cause I see you watchin'
The vixen in the black, the seductive glare
Prowlin' back and forth, dominatin' your world

[Pre-Chorus]
You look at her (You look at her)
You talk to me (You talk to me)
I talk to you, you're not listening
You never listen, God
You're so obviously staring
I can't stand and watch

[Chorus]
Baby, baby, who do you love?
I gotta know, oh, oh, oh
I gotta know, oh, oh (Ooh, baby, baby)
Baby, baby, if you want my love
I wanna know, oh, oh, oh
Baby, baby, who do you love?
I wanna know, oh, oh, oh

[Verse 2]
Oh, baby, baby
Can I ask you what exactly you are doing?
She is foxy, but I see you drooling
All over yourself, watching your little siren
In the shadows, like an evil lion

[Pre-Chorus]
I look at her, I want her too
To disappear (Go away)
Into the air (Go away)
I want to claw her, I want to bite her
I want to tear her all to pieces

[Chorus]
Baby, baby, who do you love?
I gotta know, oh, oh, oh
I gotta know, oh, oh (Ooh, baby, baby)
Baby, baby, if you want my love (Who do you love?)
I wanna know, oh, oh, oh
Baby, baby, who do you love?
I wanna know, oh, oh, oh

[Verse 3]
Jealousy inside of me
It's eating me inside-out
Got me foaming at the mouth
Girls, can I hear you shout?
Oh, we're gonna kick your ass, baby
If you go and look at another lady
Keep your eyes off her dirty tuti
Or I'll show you who the motherfucking boss is

[Outro]
I'm with you
And you're staring at her
Who do you love?
Who do you love?
Who do you love?
Who do you love?
Who do you love? Tell me
